headline: DTE Energy (DTE): Assessing Valuation as Investors Eye Utility’s Recent Momentum
summary: DTE Energy (DTE) shares have moved little this week, reflecting a relatively quiet period for the utility sector. Over the past month, the stock has climbed around 2%, catching some investors’ attention as broader market sentiment shifts. See our latest analysis for DTE Energy. DTE Energy’s steady movement this month fits into a broader story of upward momentum, with a 1-year total shareholder return of 15.5% and a strong 3-year return of nearly 46%. Momentum appears to be building, which...
